org.jgentleframework.context.services
Interface ServiceHandler

All Superinterfaces:
AnnotationRegister, DomainManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceHandlerImpl
public interface ServiceHandler
extends DomainManager, AnnotationRegister

Represents the service handler, the controller of all services in JGentle system. It contains all core services of container such as IoC service, ... moreover if corresponding provider is the ServiceProvider, besides core services such as IoC, AOP, Intercepting service, ... it also holds adscititious services such as RMI support, JDBC wrapper, JMS support, ... or customized service of other third party.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
DomainManager, AnnotationRegister
